messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: welcome to our new DJ program where we blare loud music over the intercom to increase your productivity

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: HOP's office is now open. Shadowpeople aren't allowed.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Space Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Collision Alert

A neighbouring station is throwing rocks at you. (Perhaps they've grown tired of your messages.)
